price: They say, “When will this warning[42] come to pass, if you are truthful?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: [42] i.e., their due punishment in this life or the coming of the Hour.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
